double-pointed needles 3 stitch markers gauge 9 5 sts per inch across unstretched waffle rib pattern stitch row gauge is not included because all lengths can be adjusted to suit waffle rib stitch pattern rnds 1-2 k2 p2 across round rnds 3-4 knit all stitches repeat these 4 rnds for pattern waffle rib socks pattern page 2 of 3 directions using the long tail cast on or cast on of preference co 72 stitches divide evenly across needles place marker to mark beginning of round cuff k2 p2 across all stitches each round for 30 row or length of choice leg work the waffle rib stitch pattern for 50 rnds or length of choice ending with round 2 leg from cuff to beginning of heel will be 80 rnds heel flap the heel flap is worked back and forth across 32 stitches transfer 32 stitches onto one 2 5mm double pointed needle leaving 40 stitches for the instep the instep should include 2 purl stitches on each side so waffle rib pattern may be continued after the heel shaping is complete using 2 double-pointed needles row 1 s1 purl across row row 2 s1 k1 across row repeat these two row for 29 row always slipping the first stitch of each row heel cup or turning the heel row 1 s1 knit 18 ssk turn work leaving 11 stitches unworked row 2 s1 purl 7 p2tog turn work leaving 11 stitches unworked remaining row knit the knit row always slipping the first stitch and working the ssk across the gap left from the row before purl the purl row again always slipping the first stitch and working the p2tog across the gap left from the row before continue until there are 20 stitches left on the needle ending ready to begin a knit row instep will be worked in the round using all needles knit across row 20 stitches place marker pick up 17 stitches along left edge of heel flap work round 3 of pattern
